H0.text: What links the US, 2 May 2011 and Abottabad in Pakistan. Osama bin Laden

H1.text: What links the US, 2 May 2011 and Abottabad in Pakistan. Barack Obama

H2.text: What links the US, 2 May 2011 and Abottabad in Pakistan. SEAL Team Six

H3.text: What links the US, 2 May 2011 and Abottabad in Pakistan. Sohiab

A4.text: Osama bin Laden was shot and killed by Navy Seal operatives in Abbottabad, Pakistan, on 2 May 2011, shortly after 1:00 AM local time (4:00 PM Eastern Time on 1 May 2011) by a U.S. military special operations unit.

A5.text: Upon being elected, Obama expressed his plans to renew and ramp up the U.S. search for Bin Laden.

A6.text: The Osama bin Laden File was posted on 2 May 2011 by the National Security Archive.
